page.title: 19HALLOWEEN - 31st OCTOBER
page.content: Halloween is a time when people dress up as witches etc. The reason why is that this is the time of year when spirits are supposed to sneak into peoples houses to warm themselves by the fire. Children go to houses dressed up and sing a song or tell a story. The people in the houses give them sweets or fruit for entertaining them. Sometimes you play a game in which you duck your head into a basin of water with apples in it, you try to get an apple with your teeth. Some people carve out the inside of a turnip to make a lantern, they carve a face on it and put a candle inside. In Scotland this is known as 'guising'.
